title: Select All Users
markdown:
# **Select All Users**

## Write a SQL query to select all columns from the ***users*** table.

### Table Schema
See setupSql for schema.

### Example

**Input:**
```
**users**
+----+---------+-----+
| id | name    | age |
+----+---------+-----+
| 1  | Alice   | 30  |
| 2  | Bob     | 20  |
| 3  | Charlie | 35  |
+----+---------+-----+
```

**Expected Output:**
```
+----+---------+-----+
| id | name    | age |
+----+---------+-----+
| 1  | Alice   | 30  |
| 2  | Bob     | 20  |
| 3  | Charlie | 35  |
+----+---------+-----+
```

testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, age INTEGER);
